Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2014 05:41PM fitlife8947 wrote: I found out about infrared saunas through Cancer Defeated.   http://www.cancerdefeated.com/newsletters/Infrared... I'm using one regularly at a spa until I can get my own. I plan to purchase one in the next couple of months.  It make such a difference in how I feel.  I can't wait to use it every day!
